name: biochemically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is connected with the chemistry of living things: Everyone is biochemically different. Tissue samples were assessed biochemically. See
biochemical
More examplesFewer examplesFor diabetics, cinnamon does much the same thing as insulin biochemically.A lot of people have not biochemically adapted to eating these foods.Combat changes an individual biochemically, and that changes behaviour.
